The comical revenge, or, Love in a tub acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre in Lincolns-Inn-Fields. Etherege, George, Sir, 1635?-1691.
[6], 92, [2] p.
Printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1664.
Written by G. Etherege. Cf. BM. "Licensed, July 8, 1664, Roger L'Estrange" Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
